pricing.title: Pricing that scales with every marketplace
pricing.subtitle: Predictable plans with enterprise controls, SOC 2, and priority response SLAs.

plans.name: Growth
plans.description: Built for teams launching across 5–10 marketplaces.

plans.name: Scale
plans.description: For multi-warehouse, multi-region brands pushing GMV.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: Security, procurement, and deep customization included.

faqs.q: Can we start in one region and expand later?
faqs.a: Yes. Plans are designed to add regions and channels without contract renegotiation.

faqs.q: Do you support our custom ERP or WMS?
faqs.a: We provide open APIs, webhooks, and can build certified connectors during onboarding.
Every plan includes guided onboarding, workspace setup, and workflow templates.

pricing.ctaSubtitle: We align with your IT, security, finance, and operations milestones.

cards.headline: Fulfillment resilience by design.

items: Invite your core team and set roles
Select primary region and data residency

items: Add Amazon, Shopify, and top marketplaces first
Enable read-only sync to validate data mapping

sections.title: Publish guardrails
items: Set approval flows for pricing and listings

apiReference.title: API reference
apiReference.body: REST + GraphQL endpoints for listings, inventory, orders, and automations. All requests require workspace-scoped tokens and support idempotency keys.

sdkSetup.title: SDK setup
sdkSetup.body: Install the SDK, configure keys, and use the typed clients for Node/TypeScript. Includes helpers for webhooks, retries, and pagination.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.body: Subscribe to events like listing.updated, order.created, automation.executed. Supports retries, HMAC signatures, and replay.

dataModel.title: Data model
dataModel.body: Normalized entities for Products, Variants, Listings, Orders, Shipments, Fees, and Automations with lineage and audit fields.

aiCopilot.title: AI Copilot guide
aiCopilot.body: Configure AI copilots for listing enrichment, summarizing disputes, and drafting recovery playbooks with approvals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: How we collect, use, and safeguard data across AstraCommerce OS.
sections: We only process data to deliver and improve the service.
Data is encrypted in transit and at rest; access is audited.
Subprocessors and data residency options are documented in your DPA.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Binding terms for using AstraCommerce OS.
sections: You retain ownership of your data; we provide the operating platform.
SLAs, support, and uptime targets are defined per plan.
Prohibited use includes abuse, fraud, and violating marketplace policies.

billing.title: Billing Agreement
billing.intro: How billing, renewals, and overages are handled.
sections: Plans are billed monthly or annually in advance.
Overages for events, workflows, or connectors are invoiced monthly.
Non-payment may lead to service suspension with prior notice.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: How cookies and similar technologies are used.
sections: We use necessary cookies for authentication and security.
Analytics cookies help improve product experience.
You can manage preferences in your browser or workspace settings.

status.title: System status
status.subtitle: Live health across API, connectors, and automation engine.
status.incidents: No active incidents. Historical reports available in status RSS.

maintenance.title: Scheduled maintenance
maintenance.body: AstraCommerce OS is undergoing planned maintenance. Operators remain connected; automations queue and replay after completion.
